5592.Script: if(BaseClass==Job_Swordman||BaseClass==Job_Merchant||BaseClass==Job_Thief||(BaseJob==Job_Taekwon&&Class!=Job_Soul_Linker)) bonus bStr,1; else if(BaseClass==Job_Mage||BaseClass==Job_Acolyte||class==Job_Ninja||class==Job_Soul_Linker) bonus bInt,1; else if(BaseClass==Job_Archer||BaseClass==Job_Gunslinger) bonus bDex,1; else if(BaseJob==Job_Novice||BaseJob==Job_SuperNovice) { bonus bMaxHP,80; bonus bMaxSP,30; }
